description.fr: {#CRITICAL}\_: Piochez {value:Companion.419.x}\_{Companion.419.x, plural, one[sort] other[sorts]}, {value:Companion.419.pa1}\_{%PA,Companion.419.pa1} au coût de ce sort.
description.en: {#CRITICAL}: Draw {value:Companion.419.x}\_{Companion.419.x, plural, one[spell] other[spells]}; {value:Companion.419.pa1}\_{%PA,Companion.419.pa1} to the cost of this spell.
description.es: {#CRITICAL}: Sacas {value:Companion.419.x}\_{Companion.419.x, plural, one[hechizo] other[hechizos]}, {value:Companion.419.pa1}\_{%PA,Companion.419.pa1} al coste de este hechizo.
description.de: {#CRITICAL}: Zieht {value:Companion.419.x}\_{Companion.419.x, plural, one[Zauber] other[Zauber]}, {value:Companion.419.pa1}\_{%PA,Companion.419.pa1} auf die Kosten dieses Zaubers.
description.pt: {#CRITICAL}: Compre {value:Companion.419.x}\_{Companion.419.x, plural, one[feitiço] other[feitiços]}, {value:Companion.419.pa1}\_{%PA,Companion.419.pa1} ao custo desse feitiço.
